title: U.S. - large area of temperate deciduous forest

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following countries.
(A) Australia 
(B) Brazil
(C) Chile 
(D) Russia
(E) United States of America
content.question: Country with the largest area of temperate deciduous forest

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
